Question: In the ballad "Gone Too Soon", this person gives tribute to his friend Ryan White and the plight of those with AIDS.
Hints: On January 1, 1994, this person's insurance carrier settled with the Chandlers out of court for $22 million.
This person denied the allegations, saying the sleepovers were not sexual in nature.
This person's work continues to influence numerous hip hop, rock, pop and R&B artists.
